mapper.insert: insert into `t_custom_type_info` (package_code, custom_type_name, pic_url, logo, create_time) values (#{packageCode}, #{customTypeName}, #{picUrl}, #{logo}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: update `t_custom_type_info` set package_code = #{packageCode}, custom_type_name = #{customTypeName}, pic_url = #{picUrl}, logo = #{logo}, create_time = #{createTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, package_code, custom_type_name, pic_url, logo, create_time from `t_custom_type_info`
